snippet: America’s Cup officials said San Francisco was out of the running to host the 2017 regatta, with the field narrowed to San Diego, Bermuda and Chicago.
abstract: America's Cup officials say San Francisco is out of the running to host the 2017 regatta, with field narrowed to San Diego, Bermuda and Chicago.
lead_paragraph: America’s Cup officials said San Francisco was out of the running to host the 2017 regatta, with the field narrowed to San Diego, Bermuda and Chicago.

headline.main: San Francisco Out for 2017 America’s Cup
